mapper.select: select bin.bin_id, bin.warehouse_num, bin.warehouse_loc, bin.storage_type, storage_type_desc, work_station, work_station_desc, entitled_part, bin_area, is_active, bin.create_time, bin.update_time from sys_storagebin bin left join sys_line_storagebin lbin on lbin.bin_id = bin.bin_id where lbin.line_id = #{line_id} and lbin.storage_type = #{storage_type}
